name: Asteria
tooltipText: Asteria, a MERN stack dating app, featuring a facebook login.

name: Stats On The Fly
tooltipText: Stats on The Fly, quick search an NBA player's stats and relevant youtube videos, using youtube's API and 'balldontlie.io' an open-source NBA stat API. Using HTML, Bootstrap, Javascript, and AJAX.

name: CollabHub
tooltipText: CollabHub is a website that allows users to find other developers to collaborate with. Uses passport.js for user signup/auth. Handlebars.js for a template engine. Node.js and Express.js for the backend.
